description: Atsuki`s Drowzee participated in the fake Pok√©mon Hustle event that Team Rocket put on. After stealing the Poke balls, Drowzee was sent out to protect Atsuki from Meowth who attempted to recover the `stolen` Pokemon. Zangoose`s X-Scissor quickly defeated Meowth but stalled Chishio and Atsuki long enough for Officer Jenny and Ash to intercept them. Officer Jenny Growlithe was easily able to defeat Atsuki`s Drowzee.
name: Sleep (Atsuki)
